1â†’'use client'
     2â†’import React, { createContext, useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'
     3â†’
     4â†’type Theme = 'light' | 'dark'
     5â†’
     6â†’interface ThemeContextType {
     7â†’  theme: Theme
     8â†’  toggleTheme: () => void
     9â†’}
    10â†’
    11â†’const ThemeContext = createContext<ThemeContextType | undefined>(undefined)
    12â†’
    13â†’export const useTheme = () => {
    14â†’  const context = useContext(ThemeContext)
    15â†’  if (!context) {
    16â†’    throw new Error('useTheme must be used within ThemeProvider')
    17â†’  }
    18â†’  return context
    19â†’}
    20â†’
    21â†’export const ThemeProvider: React.FC<{ children: React.ReactNode }> = ({ children }) => {
    22â†’  const [theme, setTheme] = useState<Theme>('dark') // é»˜è®¤æš—é»‘æ¨¡å¼
    23â†’
    24â†’  useEffect(() => {
    25â†’    // ä»localStorageè¯»å–ä¿å­˜çš„ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸ºæš—é»‘æ¨¡å¼
    26â†’    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') as Theme | null
    27â†’    setTheme(savedTheme || 'dark')
    28â†’  }, [])
    29â†’
    30â†’  useEffect(() => {
    31â†’    // ä¿å­˜ä¸»é¢˜è®¾ç½®å¹¶æ›´æ–°HTMLå±æ€§
    32â†’    localStorage.setItem('theme', theme)
    33â†’    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme)
    34â†’  }, [theme])
    35â†’
    36â†’  const toggleTheme = () => {
    37â†’    setTheme(prevTheme => prevTheme === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light')
    38â†’  }
    39â†’
    40â†’  return (
    41â†’    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{ theme, toggleTheme }}>
    42â†’      {children}
    43â†’    </ThemeContext.Provider>
    44â†’  )
    45â†’}

// åŸå­ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ç³»ç»Ÿç±»å‹å®šä¹‰

export interface AtomContext {
  id: string
  title: string
  content: string
  description: string
  version: string
  tags: string[]
  category: 'role' | 'principle' | 'strategy' | 'template' | 'other'
  status: 'active' | 'draft' | 'archived'
  author: string
  createdAt: string
  updatedAt: string
  usageCount: number
  versions: AtomVersion[]
  changelog: ChangeLog[]
}

export interface AtomVersion {
  version: string
  content: string
  description: string
  timestamp: string
  author: string
  changes: string[]
}

export interface ChangeLog {
  id: string
  version: string
  type: 'created' | 'updated' | 'archived' | 'restored'
  description: string
  timestamp: string
  author: string
  changes: string[]
}

export interface FilterOptions {
  search: string
  category: string
  tags: string[]
  status: string
  sortBy: 'title' | 'version' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt' | 'usageCount'
  sortOrder: 'asc' | 'desc'
}

export interface AtomListState {
  atoms: AtomContext[]
  filteredAtoms: AtomContext[]
  selectedAtom: AtomContext | null
  filter: FilterOptions
  loading: boolean
}

export type Theme = 'light' | 'dark'

   278â†’  static async searchBestPractices(filter: FilterOptions): Promise<{ success: boolean; data: BestPractice[] }> {
   279â†’    await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 10))
   280â†’    
   281â†’    let filteredPractices = [...mockBestPractices]
   282â†’
   283â†’    // æœç´¢è¿‡æ»¤
   284â†’    if (filter.search) {

   315â†’    // æ’åº
   316â†’    filteredPractices.sort((a, b) => {
   317â†’      let aValue, bValue
   318â†’      
   319â†’      switch (filter.sortBy) {
   320â†’        case 'title':
   321â†’          aValue = a.title
   322â†’          bValue = b.title
   323â†’          break

   327â†’          break

   348â†’
